long_description: Precision engineered to meet the demands of outdoor adventurers, the Inova T1 flashlight stows easily in a pocket and throws a bright white beam when you need it. White LED outputs 211 lumens on high and throws a spot beam with flood pattern up to 113m (370 ft.); switch to low to output 20 lumens and conserve battery power. 2 CR123A lithium batteries (included) provide 4 hrs. of operation on high and 47 hrs. on low. Push-button end-cap switch activates constant and momentary high and low settings and lets you lock the light off to prevent accidental operation. Use the strobe setting for signaling. Regulated output maintains consistent light output over the lifetime of the batteries. Aerospace-grade aluminum body with anodized finish stands up to regular use in the outdoors; aggressive knurling provides a positive grip. Provides IPX4 water resistance for reliability in inclement weather. Inova T1 flashlight includes a lanyard.
short_description: Precision engineered to meet the demands of outdoor adventurers, the Inova T1 flashlight stows easily in a pocket and throws a bright white beam when you need it.
